Description: Humans are the most widespread and adaptable race, thriving in nearly every environment. Their ambition and resilience drive them to excel in diverse roles, from leaders to warriors to cunning merchants.

Traits.Name: Adaptive
Traits.Description: Gain +1 to any attribute of the player's choice.

Traits.Name: Versatile
Traits.Description: Start with one additional skill at Rank 1.

Traits.Name: Resilient
Traits.Description: Once per long rest, reroll a failed saving throw.

Description: Duskborn dwell in the shadows, mastering stealth and subtlety. With skin ashen and eyes glowing faintly, they are often mistrusted by other races.

Traits.Name: Darkvision
Traits.Description: Can see in dim light as if it were bright and in darkness as if it were dim.

Traits.Name: Shadow Step
Traits.Description: Once per long rest, teleport up to 30 feet to an unoccupied space in dim light or darkness.

Description: Ironforged are sturdy and unyielding, living deep within mountains and crafting legendary weapons and armor.

Traits.Name: Stonecunning
Traits.Description: Gain advantage on Investigation or Crafting checks involving stone or metal. Add +2 to the result of any such checks.

Description: Wildkin are closely tied to nature, bearing animalistic features such as fur, claws, or fangs.

Traits.Name: Keen Senses
Traits.Description: Gain advantage on Perception checks involving smell or hearing. Add +2 to the result of Perception checks involving these senses.

Description: Born from the remnants of ancient volcanic clans, Emberfolk carry the essence of fire within their blood.

Traits.Name: Flare Strike
Traits.Description: Once per combat, ignite a weapon to deal an additional 1d6 fire damage.

Description: Carved from stone and given life through ancient rituals, the Stoneborn are relics of an age long past.

Traits.Name: Immovable
Traits.Description: Cannot be moved against their will by any physical means.

Traits.Name: Fortress Skin
Traits.Description: Gain +1 to Armor Class when wearing no armor.
